Query.name: Create.SP.GET_CHANGES
Query.SQL:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'[dbo].[GET_CHANGES]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1 ) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[GET_CHANGES]; GO CREATE procedure [dbo].[GET_CHANGES] ( @VersionNumber bigint, @ToVersionNumber bigint ) as
begin SELECT a.[DocEntry] ,a.[U_ObjType] ,[U_Key] ,b.U_KeyName ,b.U_HTBL ,[U_DateTime] ,a.[U_TrType] FROM [CHANGE_TRACKING].[dbo].[@AB_CTRK] a inner join [CHANGE_TRACKING].[dbo].[@AB_TRKOBJ] b on a.U_ObjType = b.U_ObjType where a.DocEntry > @VersionNumber and a.DocEntry <= @ToVersionNumber order by DocEntry end GO
